languages.text: "...и это не считая того, что наше убежище превратилось в точку новой дизъюнкции". {n}Караэль буквально выплевывает каждое слово.{/n} "Варп бушует в шпиле, проливаясь наружу ордами демонов. Ни для кого не секрет, каким образом разлом появился именно в обители Опустошительной бури..."

"...and that's not to mention the fact that our shelter has become a new dysjunction point." {n}Kharael literally spits the words.{/n} "The warp rages in the spire, flooding the city with daemon hordes. It is no secret how the rift came to appear in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."
languages.original_text: "...и это не считая того, что наше убежище превратилось в точку новой дизъюнкции". {n}Караэль буквально выплевывает каждое слово.{/n} "Варп бушует в шпиле, проливаясь наружу ордами демонов. Ни для кого не секрет, каким образом разлом появился именно в обители Опустошительной бури..."

traits.locale_text: "...and that's not to mention the fact that our shelter has become a new Disjunction point." {n}Kharael is literally spitting out the words.{/n} "The warp rages in the spire, flooding the city with daemon hordes. It is no secret how the rift came to be in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

It is no secret how the rift came to appear in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."

It is no secret how the rift came to appear in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

traits.locale_text: "...and that's not to mention the fact that our shelter has become a new dysjunction point." {n}Kharael literally spits the words.{/n} "The warp rages in the spire, flooding the city with daemon hordes. It is no secret how the rift came to appear in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: "... ganz zu schweigen von der Tatsache, dass unsere Zuflucht zu einem neuen Disjunktionspunkt geworden ist." {n}Kharael spuckt die letzten Worte buchstäblich aus.{/n} "Der Warp tobt im Turm, flutet die Stadt mit Dämonenhorden. Es ist kein Geheimnis, wie der Riss im Heiligtum des plündernden Sturms entstanden ist ..."
languages.original_text: "...and that's not to mention the fact that our shelter has become a new dysjunction point." {n}Kharael literally spits the words.{/n} "The warp rages in the spire, flooding the city with daemon hordes. It is no secret how the rift came to appear in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."

traits.locale_text: "... ganz zu schweigen von der Tatsache, dass unsere Zuflucht zu einem neuen Disjunktionspunkt geworden ist." {n}Kharael spuckt die letzten Worte buchstäblich aus.{/n} "Der Warp tobt im Turm, flutet die Stadt mit Dämonenhorden. Es ist kein Geheimnis, wie der Riss im Heiligtum des plündernden Sturms entstanden ist ..."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: “……更不用说，我们的避难所已经成为新的空间离析点。”{n}卡瑞尔逐字逐句地说道。{/n}“亚空间在尖塔上肆虐，恶魔大军涌入城市。至于亚空间裂缝为什么会出现在狂风阴谋团的尖塔里，这已经不是什么秘密了……”
languages.original_text: "...and that's not to mention the fact that our shelter has become a new dysjunction point." {n}Kharael literally spits the words.{/n} "The warp rages in the spire, flooding the city with daemon hordes. It is no secret how the rift came to appear in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."

traits.locale_text: “……更不用说，我们的避难所已经成为新的空间离析点。”{n}卡瑞尔逐字逐句地说道。{/n}“亚空间在尖塔上肆虐，恶魔大军涌入城市。至于亚空间裂缝为什么会出现在狂风阴谋团的尖塔里，这已经不是什么秘密了……”
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: « ... et sans parler du fait que notre refuge est devenu un nouveau point de disjonction. » {n}Les mots de Kharael giclent comme autant de crachats.{/n} « Le Warp fait rage dans la tour et déversant sur la ville des hordes démoniaques. Tout le monde sait comment la faille est apparue dans la demeure même de la Tempête ravageuse... »
languages.original_text: "...and that's not to mention the fact that our shelter has become a new dysjunction point." {n}Kharael literally spits the words.{/n} "The warp rages in the spire, flooding the city with daemon hordes. It is no secret how the rift came to appear in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."

traits.locale_text: « ... et sans parler du fait que notre refuge est devenu un nouveau point de disjonction. » {n}Les mots de Kharael giclent comme autant de crachats.{/n} « Le Warp fait rage dans la tour et déversant sur la ville des hordes démoniaques. Tout le monde sait comment la faille est apparue dans la demeure même de la Tempête ravageuse... »
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: «... y qué decir del hecho de que nuestro refugio se ha convertido en un nuevo punto de disyunción». {n}Kharael escupe las palabras.{/n} «La disformidad ruge en la torre, inundando la ciudad con hordas de daemons. Todo el mundo sabe por qué la brecha se ha abierto en la morada de la Tempestad Asoladora...».
languages.original_text: "...and that's not to mention the fact that our shelter has become a new dysjunction point." {n}Kharael literally spits the words.{/n} "The warp rages in the spire, flooding the city with daemon hordes. It is no secret how the rift came to appear in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."

traits.locale_text: «... y qué decir del hecho de que nuestro refugio se ha convertido en un nuevo punto de disyunción». {n}Kharael escupe las palabras.{/n} «La disformidad ruge en la torre, inundando la ciudad con hordas de daemons. Todo el mundo sabe por qué la brecha se ha abierto en la morada de la Tempestad Asoladora...».
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: 「…言うまでもないが、我々のシェルターは新たな分離ポイントになった」{n}カラエルは文字通り言葉を区切る。{/n}「歪みは尖塔で急速に広がり、町はディーモンの大軍に飲み込まれた。略奪の嵐のその住処からどうやって亀裂が現れたのかは誰でも知っている…」
languages.original_text: "...and that's not to mention the fact that our shelter has become a new dysjunction point." {n}Kharael literally spits the words.{/n} "The warp rages in the spire, flooding the city with daemon hordes. It is no secret how the rift came to appear in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."

traits.locale_text: 「…言うまでもないが、我々のシェルターは新たな分離ポイントになった」{n}カラエルは文字通り言葉を区切る。{/n}「歪みは尖塔で急速に広がり、町はディーモンの大軍に飲み込まれた。略奪の嵐のその住処からどうやって亀裂が現れたのかは誰でも知っている…」
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari

languages.text: "Sığınağımızın yeni bir ayrışım noktasına dönüştüğü gerçeğini söylemeye bile gerek yok." {n}Kharael, sözcükleri resmen tükürüyor.{/n} "Öteboyut, kuleye hükmedip iblisleri şehre dolduruyor. Yarığın nasıl tam Müfteris Kasırga'nın yuvasında ortaya çıktığı sır değil."
languages.original_text: "...and that's not to mention the fact that our shelter has become a new dysjunction point." {n}Kharael literally spits the words.{/n} "The warp rages in the spire, flooding the city with daemon hordes. It is no secret how the rift came to appear in the very abode of the Reaving Tempest..."

traits.locale_text: "Sığınağımızın yeni bir ayrışım noktası hâline geldiği gerçeğini söylemeye bile gerek yok." {n}Kharael sözcükleri resmen tükürüyor.{/n} "Kuleye öteboyut hâkim oluyor, şehir iblis güruhlarıyla kaynıyor. Yarığın tam da Müfteris Kasırga'nın evinde nasıl ortaya çıktığı bir sır değil."
traits.speaker: MainDrukhari
